message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XRV_USERS_EXISTS
message.locale: Cannot close location while users still operate at this location.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XRV_RESOURCES_EXISTS
message.locale: Cannot close location while resources at this location are active and operating.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XRV_PARENT_EXISTS
message.locale: Cannot close location while it exists as a parent location for another.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XRV_HIERARCHY_EMPTY
message.locale: There is no hierarchy currently available.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_ACCESS_XRV_RIGHTS_EMPTY
message.locale: You must select either view rights or maintain rights for this location.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_ACCESS_XRV_DUPLICATE_RIGHTS
message.locale: The user already has view rights for the selected additional location.
